JobFullDesc: Dell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company — we are a people company. We inspire, challenge and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities. We can’t wait for you to discover this for yourself as a  Executive Assistant on our Client Product team in Austin Tx.Delivering solutions for customers around the globe takes huge vision – but it’s our eye for detail that drives us forward. Professionals in our Administrative Support team take care of the vital details that keep our business running smoothly, worldwide. Diverse departments rely on our team for all kinds of administrative assistance and secretarial duties – from preparing correspondence, presentations and reports, to maintaining confidential, business-critical records and information.Key Responsibilities Coordinate meetings, events and team activitiesMaintain calendars for at least 2 executives and 1 Sr. DirectorProvide travel planning and mange expense reportsCoordinate meetings and meeting rooms with internal and external teams/individualsMaintain HC and org tracking for resourcesDesirable Requirements Expertise with Microsoft Office toolsTechnical backgroundExperience as an Executive Admin Assistant
